page.title: 10HOUSING
page.content:
{A New House,by Colin.
At the top of our village they are building a house.It is made with cement blocks,cement,bricks,sand,and concrete tiles and timber for the roof.They said they loved it.It is going to take about 6 months to build and 4,000 breeze blocks. They work about 10 hours a day and they are using polythene membranes for the water proofing.A man has already bought the land and they are just building on it. The person that is in charge is called{David Peters.}He also drives a hot rod car it is an{Escort X.R.3.}and he used to drive a rally car it was a {Vauxhall Magnum.}He has a wife called Shirley}and a dog called Susie.
